metadata.jurisdiction_notes: U.S. Federal system; sovereign immunity; statutory privacy & monitoring obligations
metadata.last_updated: (No effective date displayed in captured pages)
metadata.notes: Dynamic capture verified; enumerated sections extracted; no effective date disclosed.

categories.name: Clarity & Transparency
categories.key_evidence: Enumerated sections + explanatory lead-ins; absent effective date & changelog.

categories.name: Data Collection & Use
categories.key_evidence: Statutory mission focus; monitoring + analytics disclosed; limited user-configurable controls.

categories.name: User Privacy
categories.key_evidence: Persistent monitoring; CUI/PII responsibility shifted to user; cookie opt-out only.

categories.name: Content & IP Rights
categories.key_evidence: Federal works public domain; D&B data carve-out clearly bounded; no perpetual user content license.

categories.name: Account Management
categories.key_evidence: Admin role eligibility constraints + 90-day API/password rotation; appeal paths not defined.

categories.name: Dispute Resolution
categories.key_evidence: No arbitration; remedies still constrained by sovereign immunity.

categories.name: Terms Changes
categories.key_evidence: Implied update by posting; no version archive; no effective date.

categories.name: Algorithmic Decisions
categories.key_evidence: Screening / exclusion automation not transparent; no published appeal SLA.

metadata.jurisdiction_notes: Utah law; exclusive state/federal courts in Salt Lake County; no arbitration or class waiver
metadata.business_model: Free nonprofit genealogy platform (data collaboration with commercial partners)

categories.name: Clarity & Transparency
categories.key_evidence: Explicit headings; mission framing; perpetual license plainly disclosed; artifact pollution obscures raw metrics.

categories.name: Data Collection & Use
categories.key_evidence: Commercial partner collaboration stated; no opt-out; cross-border transfers acknowledged without minimization commitments.

categories.name: User Privacy
categories.key_evidence: Living person data sharing; deletion pathways externalized; perpetual license survival ambiguity; limited granular controls.

categories.name: Content & IP Rights
categories.key_evidence: Perpetual, irrevocable, sublicensable, derivative rights 'for any and all purposes' with no attribution or reversion.

categories.name: Account Management
categories.key_evidence: Standard credential obligations; vague suspension triggers; no appeal; termination effect on data unclear.

categories.name: Dispute Resolution
categories.key_evidence: No arbitration, no class waiver, but Utah exclusive forum + $0 effective liability cap.

categories.name: Terms Changes
categories.key_evidence: Unilateral change via continued use acceptance; no materiality threshold; no direct notice requirement.

categories.name: Algorithmic Decisions
categories.key_evidence: Opaque genealogical matching; mandatory binary sex data model; no explanation of ML training or reversal mechanics.

documents.source_path: test-pages/all-mocks/test-pages/Website Terms of Service/FamilySearch Terms of Use. Everything you need to know, in one place..html
